original_text: from the people of Israel's half Moses took one of every 50, both of persons and of beasts, and gave them to the Levites who kept guard over the tabernacle of the Lord, as the Lord commanded Moses.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손의 그 절반에서 모세가 사람이나 짐승의 오십분의 일을 취하여 여호와의 장막을 맡은 레위인에게 주었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하심과 같았더라

sentences.original_text: from the people of Israel's half
both of persons and of beasts
and gave them to the Levites
who kept guard over the tabernacle of the Lord
